card.name: Ajani, Sleeper Agent
card.text: Compleated ({G/W/P} can be paid with {G}, {W}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.)+1: Reveal the top card of your library. card.name: Braids, Arisen Nightmare

card.name: The Phasing of Zhalfir
card.text: Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 2/2 black Phyrexian creature token.
